verbs.description: Unlike North Korea today , Iran [V: does] not possess a single nuclear weapon . By trashing the Iran deal , President Trump risks turning Iran into North Korea .

[ARGM-ADV: Unlike North Korea] [ARGM-TMP: today] , [ARG0: Iran] does [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: possess] [ARG1: a single nuclear weapon] . By trashing the Iran deal , President Trump risks turning Iran into North Korea .
Unlike North Korea today , Iran does not possess a single nuclear weapon . By [V: trashing] [ARG1: the Iran deal] , [ARG0: President Trump] risks turning Iran into North Korea .
Unlike North Korea today , Iran does not possess a single nuclear weapon . By trashing the Iran deal , [ARG0: President Trump] risks [V: turning] [ARG1: Iran] [ARG2: into North Korea] .
